channel.title: Extra Bank Space?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb392/tactical_crab/idea.jpg[/img] I do not know whether it is client side or server side, my idea on server side didn't work so my guess it is client side....
Well on my custom bank interface i noticed extra space. I thought increasing the bank space would make the space worth something but it doesn't work... completely. I add an item into the "extra space" and it is not visible, nor can you take it out, basically its stuck there until removing it by editing the character file.
well, think this "extra space" can be worth something if you could fill it in, care to help? if necessary ill post what is needed on here.

item.title: Extra Bank Space?
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:

I do not know whether it is client side or server side, my idea on server side didn’t work so my guess it is client side…

Well on my custom bank interface i noticed extra space. I thought increasing the bank space would make the space worth something but it doesn’t work… completely. I add an item into the “extra space” and it is not visible, nor can you take it out, basically its stuck there until removing it by editing the character file.

well, think this “extra space” can be worth something if you could fill it in, care to help?
